definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to step out/to take a (first) step
to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to stride toward (success)/to march toward/to take a step toward
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Mahdi or Mehdi (Arabic: Guided one), redeemer of some Islamic prophesy
Chen Chi-mai (1964-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice premier of the Republic of China (2019-)

sentences.english: Now paved and smooth as glass on over to Stumpy Meadows Reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 現在，順利鋪平玻璃上交給矮墩墩邁德斯水庫。

sentences.english: We have made a step towards success.
sentences.chinese: 我們已向成功邁進一步。

sentences.english: Mysore sandalwood oil was renowned and considered superior to all other varieties.
sentences.chinese: 邁索爾檀香油是著名的，並認爲優於其他所有品種。

sentences.english: GILDEMEISTER as a manufacturer of cutting machine tools, holds a leading position worldwide as a full-liner.
sentences.chinese: 吉特邁集團是全球領先的切削機牀製造商。

sentences.english: The Scottish government engaged Libya and the United Kingdom on the matter of releasing al-Megrahi.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭政府也參與了利比亞和英國釋放邁格拉希事件。

sentences.english: Midas looked at his child. He saw what he had done.
sentences.chinese: 邁德斯看着自己的孩子，他發現了他所幹的事。

sentences.english: If we're looking at a similar mortality rate, that's the end of the Minoans.
sentences.chinese: 如果是同樣的死亡率，那就是邁諾安人的末日。

sentences.english: Mr Mikesell's old age brought with it a noteworthy achievement.
sentences.chinese: 邁克塞爾的高齡同時帶來了顯著的成績。

sentences.english: Mysore became the "backbone" of resistance against Britain. There were four Britain-Mysore wars when Britai…
sentences.chinese: 英國爲征服邁索爾，與之發生了四次戰爭。

sentences.english: Michael records all 6 cardholders on cell phone video.
sentences.chinese: 邁可用手機拍下了所有6個持卡人影像。

sentences.english: Myra got out of bed and lighted the lamp on her dressing table.
sentences.chinese: 邁拉走下牀來，開亮了梳妝檯上的燈。

sentences.english: Michelson experiment is one of the most important experiments in college physics.
sentences.chinese: 邁克耳孫實驗是大學物理中的一個重要實驗。

sentences.english: The man, Abdelbaset al-Megrahi was released from prison in Scotland two weeks ago on compassionate grounds.
sentences.chinese: 邁格拉希兩週前處於同情被蘇格蘭監獄釋放。

sentences.english: Rancisis and Vos led three battalions to Saleucami.
sentences.chinese: 蘭齊希斯和沃斯率領三個營前往薩盧卡邁。

sentences.english: An interferometer invented by Michelson was used by Michelson and Morely.
sentences.chinese: 邁克耳孫和莫雷使用一臺邁克耳孫發明的干涉儀。

sentences.english: An interferometer invented by Michelson was used by Michelson and Morely.
sentences.chinese: 邁克耳孫和莫雷使用一臺邁克耳孫發明的干涉儀。
